languages.text: Когитатор, созданный под руководством Фабрикатора-предателя, был найден в глубинах мануфакторума. Еретическая машина должна быть остановлена, однако результаты ее вычислений могут послужить Инквизиции...

The cogitator created under the guidance of the traitorous Fabricator-Censor has been discovered in the depths of the manufactorum. The heretical machine needs to be stopped, but the results of its calculations could benefit the Inquisition...
languages.original_text: Когитатор, созданный под руководством Фабрикатора-предателя, был найден в глубинах мануфакторума. Еретическая машина должна быть остановлена, однако результаты ее вычислений могут послужить Инквизиции...

traits.locale_text: The cogitator created under the guidance of the traitorous Fabricator has been discovered in the depths of the manufactorum. The heretical machine needs to be stopped, but the results of its calculations could benefit the Inquisition...

The cogitator created under the guidance of the traitorous Fabricator has been discovered in the depths of the manufactorum. The heretical machine needs to be stopped, but the results of its calculations could benefit the Inquisition...

The cogitator created under the guidance of the traitorous Fabricator-Censor has been discovered in the depths of the manufactorum. The heretical machine needs to be stopped, but the results of its calculations could benefit the Inquisition...

languages.text: 在制造工厂深处，行商浪人找到了由叛乱的铸造审查师指导制造的沉思者。一方面，必须阻止这台异端机器继续运行，但另一方面，它的计算结果可能会对审判庭起到帮助……
languages.original_text: The cogitator created under the guidance of the traitorous Fabricator-Censor has been discovered in the depths of the manufactorum. The heretical machine needs to be stopped, but the results of its calculations could benefit the Inquisition...

traits.locale_text: 在制造工厂深处，行商浪人找到了由叛乱的铸造审查师指导制造的思考器。一方面，必须阻止这台异端机器继续运行，但另一方面，它的计算结果可能会对审判庭起到帮助……

languages.text: 裏切り者のファブリケーター・センサーの指導下で製造された考算機が聖工場の深部で発見された。異端の機械は停止させなければならないが、その計算結果は異端審問庁に役立つかもしれない…
languages.original_text: The cogitator created under the guidance of the traitorous Fabricator-Censor has been discovered in the depths of the manufactorum. The heretical machine needs to be stopped, but the results of its calculations could benefit the Inquisition...

traits.locale_text: 裏切り者のファブリケーター・センサーの指導下で製造された考算機が聖工場の深部で発見された。異端の機械は停止させなければならないが、その計算結果は異端審問庁に役立つかもしれない…

languages.text: El cogitador creado bajo la guía del fabricator-censor traidor ha sido encontrado en las profundidades del manufactorum. Es necesario detener la máquina hereje, pero los resultados de sus cálculos podrían beneficiar a la Inquisición...
languages.original_text: The cogitator created under the guidance of the traitorous Fabricator-Censor has been discovered in the depths of the manufactorum. The heretical machine needs to be stopped, but the results of its calculations could benefit the Inquisition...

traits.locale_text: El cogitador creado bajo la guía del fabricator-censor traidor ha sido encontrado en las profundidades del manufactorum. Es necesario detener la máquina hereje, pero los resultados de sus cálculos podrían beneficiar a la Inquisición...

languages.text: Der unter Aufsicht des verräterischen Fabricator-Zensors geschaffene Cogitator wurde in den Tiefen des Manufactorums entdeckt. Die ketzerische Maschine muss gestoppt werden, aber die Ergebnisse ihrer Berechnungen könnten für die Inquisition von Vorteil sein ...
languages.original_text: The cogitator created under the guidance of the traitorous Fabricator-Censor has been discovered in the depths of the manufactorum. The heretical machine needs to be stopped, but the results of its calculations could benefit the Inquisition...

traits.locale_text: Der unter Aufsicht des verräterischen Fabricator-Zensors geschaffene Cogitator wurde in den Tiefen des Manufactorums entdeckt. Die ketzerische Maschine muss gestoppt werden, aber die Ergebnisse ihrer Berechnungen könnten für die Inquisition von Vorteil sein ...

languages.text: Le cogitateur créé sous les ordres du fabricator-censeur félon a été retrouvé dans les profondeurs du manufactorum. La machine hérétique doit être stoppée, mais les résultats de ses calculs pourraient servir à l'Inquisition.
languages.original_text: The cogitator created under the guidance of the traitorous Fabricator-Censor has been discovered in the depths of the manufactorum. The heretical machine needs to be stopped, but the results of its calculations could benefit the Inquisition...

traits.locale_text: Le cogitateur créé sous les ordres du fabricator-censeur félon a été retrouvé dans les profondeurs du manufactorum. La machine hérétique doit être stoppée, mais les résultats de ses calculs pourraient servir à l'Inquisition.

languages.text: Hain Denetçi Fabrikatör'ün rehberliğinde yaratılan kavramsayar, manufaktorumun derinliklerinde bulundu. Kâfir makinenin durdurulması gerekiyor. Öte yandan hesaplamalarının sonuçları, Engizisyon'a fayda sağlayabilir.
languages.original_text: The cogitator created under the guidance of the traitorous Fabricator-Censor has been discovered in the depths of the manufactorum. The heretical machine needs to be stopped, but the results of its calculations could benefit the Inquisition...
